home.subtitle: Professional swimmer health management system for tracking medical assessments, in-body examinations, and performance metrics.
home.Profile descriptions: Complete profiles with contact information and emergency data.
home.tracking: Track body composition including weight, muscle mass, and body fat percentage.
home.medicalTrackingDesc: Manage medical records and examination files easily.
home.dashboardDesc: Monitor swimmer performance and health metrics from one place.
home.secureDesc: Ensures role-based access control so swimmers only see their own data.
home.joinUsDesc: Create your account and start tracking your health metrics today

Auth.title: Welcome to SwimHealth
Auth.subtitle: Choose your role to get started
Auth.name: Full Name
Auth.Sdesc: Join as a swimmer to track your progress, view training plans, and manage your health records.
Auth.Cdesc: Sign in as a coach to manage your swimmers, create training schedules, and monitor health metrics.
Auth.CSdesc: Enter your credentials to access the dashboard

medical.uploadFiles: Upload and manage your medical files
